name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam saves Jonas from the apocalypse.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: They must use it to break the cycle. Martha and Jonas must travel to the origin world.

During the Apocalypse, time stands still for a fraction of a second, breaking the chain of cause and effect. For a moment, there is a gap through which reality can proceed in two different directions: a switch at the knot of the time loop.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia realized that they're not all part of the knot. They must remove the knot to destroy all that was born on it and keeping everything alive that already existed in the origin world.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adam and old Claudia arrive to sic mundus' headquarters.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha meets Adam and tells him that she has fulfilled the mission.

name: Agnes
description: Agnes joins sic mundus again.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adam gives her the newspaper that shows old claudia's death.

name: Agnes, Silja
description: Agnes say goodbye to Silja.

name: Agnes
description: Agnes leaves through the God Particle.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Adam explains adult Charlotte that in just one day they are going to unravel the knot. He wants to save his world, not Eve's.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J), Charlotte Doppler (J)
description: Adult charlotte and adult Elisabeth leave through the God Particle to 2041.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha reminds Adam that she has kept her end of the bargain. Now she wants to know what is the origin and how to destroy it.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Adam reveals to teen Martha that the female stranger didn't send teen Jonas and her to stop the apocalypse. Instead they created the seed: the beginning of the knot, and also its end.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Adam encloses Martha.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam wants to create a "paradise". Unending darkness in which nothing exists.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Silja
description: Silja frees Martha and takes her with Adam.

name: Magnus Nielsen (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Adult Franziska and adult Magnus travel to find Martha.

name: Bartosz Tiedemann (J), Silja
description: Teen Silja travel to 1890 to meet Bartosz.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Adam ties Martha up in the former cooling bash. he wants to destroy her and her unborn child, putting an end to both worlds.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam takes the St. Christopher medallion ...
... and activates the machine.

name: Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Martha dies ...
... but nothing happens.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Claudia Tiedemann (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Old Claudia arrives and explains to Adam that his attempt has failed due to quantum entanglement. Eve found a way to change the course of events, meaning there is a second pregnant Martha out there that will give birth and preserve the knot.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia reveals that the origin doesn't lies in the connection between both worlds but in reality it lies outside both of those worlds.
There is a third world: the origin world.

name: Tannhaus, Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Tannhaus, in the origin world, lost someone and he tried to bring them back from the death, but instead, he split and destroyed his world, thus creating both adam and eve worlds.
There is a way to destroy the knot by preventing the invention of travel through space and time in the origin world.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia has discovered quantum entanglement and the origin world.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Old Claudia explains adult Jonas his next steps. he have to set the course, no matter how hard it may seem.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old Claudia tears the last pages.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas learns from Claudia in the bunker/base of operations.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas shows the young girl the god particle, temporarily stabilizes it, and goes through the portal.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Adult Elisabeth executes three men for entering the dead zone.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adam shows teen Jonas the god particle they created and explains that it's the key to teen Jonas breaking the 33-year cycle.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J), Mikkel Nielsen / Michael Kahnwald (J)
description: Jonas leaves for 2019 through the god particle to stop adult Mikkel/Michael from killing himself.

description: Adult Noah counsels teen Noah about his role and ask him to give adult Jonas Martha's letter.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Teen Noah leaves for 2020.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah confronts Adam with the missing Triquetra pages and says he's been used.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Agnes, Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Noah tries to kill Adam but Adult Agnes arrives and kills Adult Noah.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Magnus Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Magnus and Adult Franziska activate the God Particle, enabling Adam to leave for 2020.

name: Magnus Nielsen (J)
description: Adult Magnus and adult Franziska face the god particle and await the end of the cycle.
The apocalypse erupts in Winden.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J), Elisabeth Doppler (J), Peter
description: Adult Peter and teen Elisabeth look for Charlotte and Franziska among the bodies. Since they are not there, they assume they are alive and have traveled.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J), Peter
description: Adult Peter and teen Elisabeth meet teen Noah. he says that he will protect Elisabeth even after Peter is killed.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J), Peter
description: Teen Elisabeth asks adult Peter for the notebook.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Regina Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia takes care of adult Regina.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia prepares a family tree in the bunker and records her discoveries about the god particle.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Regina Tiedemann (J), Tronte Nielsen (J), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia asks adult Tronte to kill adult Regina, so adult Claudia can move heaven and earth to prevent it.

name: Regina Tiedemann (J), Tronte Nielsen (J)
description: Old Tronte kills adult Regina because "she said it's the only way to save you".

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Regina Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia finds adult Regina dead.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Regina Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia buries adult Regina.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Adult Claudia (Martha's world) asks adult Claudia (Jonas' world) to join the light side (Eve) instead of the shadow side (Adam).

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description:
She explains the meaning of the three cycles:

- teen Jonas opened the passage in 2020
- adult Jonas had previously shut in 2019
- the passage was opened in summer 1986 for the first time

in all three moments, they left behind traces of cesium residue. In every cycle, at each of these three moments, the cesium is carried throught the tunnel and back before it's completely decayed.

It exponentially expands endlessly, so it creates the passage.
Everything has to happen again. They must keep the loop.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult claudia (Martha's world) gives adult Claudia (Jonas' world) the notebook and explains that she need lead everybody along the same path. She need the mantain the knot.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia uses her time machine.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia reads the notebook.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Teen Elisabeth returns to the trailer alone and finds a burglar there. He attacks her, ties her up, and tries to rape her.

name: Peter
description: Adult Peter surprises him. A fight ensues and Peter is killed.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Teen Elisabeth manages to free herself and kills the burglar with a fire extinguisher.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Utterly distraught, she goes to the caves and teen Noah finds her.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia goes to the power plant and sees the god particle.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Jonas appears. He is trying to figure out a way for the god particle to work.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Adult Claudia tells him that she still has the time machine but its broken.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M)
description: Jonas doesn't trust adult Claudia. To convince him, she says that she can help him saving Martha.

name: Elisabeth Doppler (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Teen Elisabeth and teen Noah discover the door that reads "Sic mundus creatus est", but the time travel is closed.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Elisabeth Doppler (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Teen Noah consoles teen Elisabeth by talking about the paradise promised by Adam.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas and adult Claudia  try to make the god particle work without success.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Teen Jonas can't take it anymore and tries to hang himself.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Teen Noah saves him and reminds him that he cannot die because his future version already exists. This is the start of a friendship between them.

name: Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Teen Noah tells him that they have found the passage and reminds him that he must keep his promise.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Adult Jonas, adult Noah, and old Claudia work on stabilizing the time travel portal.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: Adult jonas tells that he changed the component in the passage and he thinks this time will be different.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: They spend decades working on the project, leading Noah to doubt Claudia's efforts. He believes she is sabotaging her own work.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia (Martha's world) reminds old Claudia (Jonas' world), that she must guide Jonas on his path.

name: Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Regina Tiedemann (J), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia (Jonas' world) remembers what her older version said:  "If all of this works, our Regina will live." Then, why does she need to suffer endlessly?

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia (Jonas' world), doesn't trust Eve anymore and kills old Claudia (Martha's world).

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J), Martha Nielsen / Eve (M), Claudia Tiedemann (J)
description: Old claudia (Jonas' world) steals old Claudia's (Martha's world) time machine and impersonates her identity.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J), Elisabeth Doppler (J)
description: Adult Charlotte and adult Elisabeth arrive to 2041.

description: Adult Noah threatens adult Jonas but he doesn't know where Charlotte is.

name: Charlotte Doppler (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)
description: Noah grabs the notebook and vows to find Charlotte.

name: Claudia Tiedemann (J), Jonas Kahnwald / Adam (J)
description: After decades of failed attempts, adult Jonas and old Claudia succeed in building a time travel portal in the ruins of the power plant.
An explosion at the power plant causes the leak of radioactive material.

name: Bernd Doppler (J)
description: Old Bernd covers it up and puts the resulting radioactive waste in yellow barrels hidden in a cave.
The explosion opens the portal in the passage.

name: Helge Doppler (J), Noah / Hanno Tauber (J)

description: Mad's attempt to travel with Noah's machine.

The time portal opens over Winden.

description: When old Egon doesn't listen, they fight and he falls and hits his head.

description: Adult Claudia decides to let old Egon die, thinking this is the sacrifice she needs to make to save Regina.

description: Old H.G. Tannhaus shows to teen Charlotte a photo of his son, his son's wife and his granddaughter.
They had an accident and his son and his wife died. His granddaughter's body never appeared.

description: That day, two women handed H.G. Tannhaus a little Charlotte. She only carried a pocket watch with her name.
